master_picture.title: Friendly Fight
master_picture.subject: Common Kingfisher
master_picture.description: Intense fight over a fish caught early morning. Interestingly this was only a short fight and they settled to sharing it very soon.

other_pictures.title: Friendly Fight
other_pictures.subject: Common Kingfisher
other_pictures.description: Intense fight over a fish caught early morning. Interestingly this was only a short fight and they settled to sharing it very soon.

other_pictures.title: Contemplating
other_pictures.subject: Common Kingfisher
other_pictures.description: Amazing to see the focus with which it is looking at the waters. Combination of focus and natural talent.

other_pictures.title: Family Gathering
other_pictures.subject: Common Kingfisher
other_pictures.description: After an earlier quarrel, now we see them togther in a friendly mood.

other_pictures.title: Keen Observers
other_pictures.subject: Common Kingfisher
other_pictures.description: Both of them looking at the same time at something they observed nearby. Probably a threat or some disturbance.

other_pictures.title: Perfect Landing
other_pictures.subject: Common Kingfisher
other_pictures.description: Kingfisher is known for its fast flight and it is amazing how they stop suddengly and accurately to land on the edge. Amazing talent.

other_pictures.title: Keen Observers
other_pictures.subject: White Throated Kingfisher
other_pictures.description: Early morning time and it is still getting ready to start the day. Looking around at the possibilities for today.

other_pictures.title: Breakfast Time
other_pictures.subject: Common Kingfisher
other_pictures.description: Just about to gulp the tasty catch. Amazing how they do it without support of any extra pair of hands. Image a human eating food without using his hands.

other_pictures.title: Waiting for the Catch
other_pictures.subject: Common Kingfisher
other_pictures.description: Patience and perseverence is the name of the game. How patienntly they focus on the water to catch their prey.

other_pictures.title: Captain of the Boat
other_pictures.subject: White Throated Kingfisher
other_pictures.description: In Varanasi (India), saw it confidently sitting on the moore of the boat as a boat-captain. King of the Fishers is acting as Captain of the boat.

master_picture.title: Morning Dose of Nectar
master_picture.subject: Purple Rumped Sunbird Female
master_picture.description: Sitting on the topmost branch of a tree and totally absorbed in drinking the nectar from the yellow flowers. Great start of the day for her.

other_pictures.title: Morning Dose of Nectar
other_pictures.subject: Purple Rumped Sunbird Female
other_pictures.description: Sitting on the topmost branch of a tree and totally absorbed in drinking the nectar from the yellow flowers. Great start of the day for her.

other_pictures.title: Material Re-Use
other_pictures.subject: Purple Rumped Sunbird Female
other_pictures.description: Saw this female hopping from her current nest to this old nest multiple times. Later realized it is pulling out material from old nest to re-use in her new nest.

other_pictures.title: Tearing Down Nest
other_pictures.subject: Purple Rumped Sunbird Female
other_pictures.description: Another moment from the action where the female was tearing down her old nest to re-use material in new nest. Amazing sense of re-use and efficiency.

other_pictures.title: Posing for Camera
other_pictures.subject: Purple Rumped Sunbird Male
other_pictures.description: This cute male was posing on a nice perch and let me approach to take the picture from close. Thank you for the photography friendly pose.

other_pictures.title: Morning Gymnastics
other_pictures.subject: Purple Rumped Sunbird Female
other_pictures.description: Amazing skill of hanging up-side down and stretching to reach to the item of its desire. Nothing is im-possible for these beautiful skillful small birds.

master_picture.title: Love Is In The Air
master_picture.subject: Rose Ringed Parakeet
master_picture.description: High up in the Sky and enjoying their moment together. This cute pair was not even bothering me taking a snap of their personal moment.

other_pictures.title: Love Is In The Air
other_pictures.subject: Rose Ringed Parakeet
other_pictures.description: High up in the Sky and enjoying their moment together. This cute pair was not even bothering me taking a snap of their personal moment.

other_pictures.title: Private Moment
other_pictures.subject: Rose Ringed Parakeet
other_pictures.description: Another view of this cute pair having their moment up in the sky away from all disturbances.

other_pictures.title: Majestic Flight
other_pictures.subject: Rose Ringed Parakeet
other_pictures.description: In full flight showing off its amazing wing-span and tail feathers. What a beautiful creation of nature.

other_pictures.title: Sharing and Caring
other_pictures.subject: Rose Ringed Parakeet
other_pictures.description: Two buddies sharing from the same pomegranate fruit.  Love and care for each other is the core principle of nature in all creatures.

master_picture.title: Family Time
master_picture.subject: Red Vented Bulbul
master_picture.description: The pair is enjoying the sunny blue sky in the morning. Looking forward  to a great time rest of the day.

other_pictures.title: Family Time
other_pictures.subject: Red Vented Bulbul
other_pictures.description: The pair is enjoying the sunny blue sky in the morning. Looking forward  to a great time rest of the day.0

other_pictures.title: Wind on My Face
other_pictures.subject: Red Vented Bulbul
other_pictures.description: This cute adult was sitting on a branch and braving the strong winds. All the effort to give me a good pose for the photograph.

other_pictures.title: Contemplating
other_pictures.subject: Red Vented Bulbul
other_pictures.description: With a construction material that it had freshly collected, it was thinking how to use it in the construction of its magnificient nest. Nature's cute architect at work.

master_picture.title: Majestic Walk
master_picture.subject: White Browed Wagtail
master_picture.description: With the background of the colorful boats, it was doing a ramp-walk to give me a striking pose. This was taken at the banks of the river Ganges in Varanasi (India).

other_pictures.title: Majestic Walk
other_pictures.subject: White Browed Wagtail
other_pictures.description: With the background of the colorful boats, it was doing a ramp-walk to give me a striking pose. This was taken at the banks of the river Ganges in Varanasi (India).

other_pictures.title: Close Buddies
other_pictures.subject: White Browed Wagtail
other_pictures.description: Two friends chit-chatting in the early morning sun. Wonder what they were chatting about?

other_pictures.title: The Captain
other_pictures.subject: White Browed Wagtail
other_pictures.description: Another pose on a boat at the bank of river Ganges in Varanasi (India). Looks like the captain of the boat is inspecting the boat.

master_picture.title: The Balancing Act
master_picture.subject: Ashy Prinia
master_picture.description: Posing on a perch in the morning sun. It is an amazing skill they poses to balance on moving branches in vertical position.

other_pictures.title: The Balancing Act
other_pictures.subject: Ashy Prinia
other_pictures.description: Posing on a perch in the morning sun. It is an amazing skill they poses to balance on moving branches in vertical position.

other_pictures.title: The Smart One
other_pictures.subject: Ashy Prinia
other_pictures.description: This cute little one was giving a smart pose for the camera. Glad to capture it from close.

other_pictures.title: Windy Morning
other_pictures.subject: Ashy Prinia
other_pictures.description: Sitting on a high branch up in the sky and braving the winds on its face. Fortunately it still managed to hold on to the pose for the camera.

master_picture.title: My Dose of Greens
master_picture.subject: Yellow Billed Babbler
master_picture.description: Daily diet of Green vegetables are good for the health. This one was inspired by it and was showing off its green catch for the breakfast. Eat healthy and Stay Healthy.

other_pictures.title: My Dose of Greens
other_pictures.subject: Yellow Billed Babbler
other_pictures.description: Daily diet of Green vegetables are good for the health. This one was inspired by it and was showing off its green catch for the breakfast. Eat healthy and Stay Healthy.

other_pictures.title: Tasty Breakfast
other_pictures.subject: Yellow Billed Babbler
other_pictures.description: This one had a big juicy catch for breakfast. Another one inspired by the saying - Eat Green to Stay Healthy.

other_pictures.title: Curious Look
other_pictures.subject: Yellow Billed Babbler
other_pictures.description: What are you staring at so curiously? Appears that it was irritated by the disturbing neighbors.

master_picture.title: Smart Looks
master_picture.subject: Asian Green Bee-Eater
master_picture.description: Amazing gift of colors by nature. I wonder who does the regular hair trimming for them? Keeping them always looking so smart and neat and clean.

other_pictures.title: Smart Looks
other_pictures.subject: Asian Green Bee-Eater
other_pictures.description: Amazing gift of colors by nature. I wonder who does the regular hair trimming for them? Keeping them always looking so smart and neat and clean.

other_pictures.title: Nature's Color Canvas
other_pictures.subject: Asian Green Bee-Eater
other_pictures.description: Looks like wind has disturbed its neatly styled looks. Time for a grooming session with it's hair styler.

other_pictures.title: The Predator and Prey
other_pictures.subject: Asian Green Bee-Eater
other_pictures.description: They as so skilled to catch flying Bees or Flies. Sitting on a high perch, they scan the space around them for flying Bees. Once a Bee is targetted, then swiftly fly to catch it and then come back to the perch to enjoy the catch.

master_picture.title: Beauty Amongst Thorns
master_picture.subject: Cinerious Tit
master_picture.description: Thanks to this cute little one for giving a striking pose sitting on a thorny branch. It is a very active bird and always moving and jumping around different branches.

other_pictures.title: Beauty Amongst Thorns
other_pictures.subject: Cinerious Tit
other_pictures.description: Thanks to this cute little one for giving a striking pose sitting on a thorny branch. It is a very active bird and always moving and jumping around different branches.

other_pictures.title: The Look
other_pictures.subject: Cinerious Tit
other_pictures.description: Amazing creation with a beautiful combination of black and white to create such a look. Fortunate to get a pose from this little one.

other_pictures.title: Fun Time
other_pictures.subject: Cinerious Tit
other_pictures.description: Enough of posing. Now it was back to having fun in its own style. Swinging on a branch up-side down and enjoying the treat.

master_picture.title: Curious Looker
master_picture.subject: Scaly Breasted Munia
master_picture.description: Curiously looking at me trying to take its picture without prior permission. Thanks for obliging to taking a snap and sharing it.

other_pictures.title: Curious Looker
other_pictures.subject: Scaly Breasted Munia
other_pictures.description: Curiously looking at me trying to take its picture without prior permission. Thanks for obliging to taking a snap and sharing it.

other_pictures.title: Camouflage At Its Best
other_pictures.subject: Juvenile Indian Robin
other_pictures.description: Sitting on a perch looking for its prey and while having protection from its predators. It knows where to go and when safely.

master_picture.title: Morning on the Ganges
master_picture.subject: Varanasi
master_picture.description: View of the palace taken while having a early morning boat ride on the river Ganges in Varanasi (India). Soft morning glow further magnifies this majestic palace's looks.

other_pictures.title: Morning on the Ganges
other_pictures.subject: Varanasi
other_pictures.description: View of the palace taken while having a early morning boat ride on the river Ganges in Varanasi (India). Soft morning glow further magnifies this majestic palace's looks.

other_pictures.title: Morning Glow
other_pictures.subject: Varanasi
other_pictures.description: Another one taken while having a early morning boat ride on the river Ganges in Varanasi (India). Love the skyline and the lighting on it created in the golden hour.

other_pictures.title: Varanasi Palaces
other_pictures.subject: Varanasi
other_pictures.description: The palace on the banks of river Ganges in Varanasi (India) and shinning in the morning sun. Love the lighting on the palaces and the reflections in the holy water.

other_pictures.title: Birds Eye View
other_pictures.subject: Varanasi
other_pictures.description: Beauty not just at ground level but also from high up. We see the holy river Ganges and colorful boats inviting tourists for a beautiful ride.

other_pictures.title: Birds Attack
other_pictures.subject: Varanasi
other_pictures.description: Every year in the early winter season, Seaguls come here to river bank in Varanasi (India) and nest. Tourists offer food to them during their boat ride. So now Seagul's have become so accustomed that they have become friendly to the tourist boats and circle around them when someone offers them food. Amazing from the perspective of capturing a photograph.

other_pictures.title: Misty Morning
other_pictures.subject: Vancouver
other_pictures.description: Morning fog in the winter season in Vancouver is very popular. Specially on the bay side, it creates such amazing views with the fog shrouded cityscape and reflections in the bay water.

other_pictures.title: Bay Side Reflections
other_pictures.subject: Vancouver
other_pictures.description: Another view of the fog shrouded cityscape and its reflections in the bay water. The fog cover has reduced little by now as the morning progresses. But still enough to create an amazing view.

other_pictures.title: Majestic Skyline
other_pictures.subject: NewYork
other_pictures.description: Riding on a boat on the Hudson river in NewYork, could not resist this majestic view of the NewYork skyline. Special interest on the tallest one.

other_pictures.title: From Rialto Bridge
other_pictures.subject: Venice
other_pictures.description: On a bright sunny day, the main Canal in Venice with tourists having romatic rides on the world famous Gondolas.

other_pictures.title: Roman Grandeur
other_pictures.subject: Rome
other_pictures.description: In the city of grand architectures, everywhere you look around you see majestic buildings. This view was captured from the top of the tourist Bus that operates in Rome. A must ride for all when you are in Rome.

other_pictures.title: Roman Night
other_pictures.subject: Rome
other_pictures.description: Not just in the day time, even at night Rome provide majestic view of its grand buildings and streets. I love the way the street lights hanging in the middle of the street.  Just enough ligting to create stunning views.

other_pictures.title: Florencian Grandeur
other_pictures.subject: Florence
other_pictures.description: Duomo is one of the most beautiful and visited place in Florence. Looking at the city skyline from the Michaelangelo Point, this one looks amazing specially at Dusk hours.

other_pictures.title: Winter Beauty
other_pictures.subject: Banff
other_pictures.description: Although every season has its own beauty and attraction in Banff. But for me, Winter was an amazing experience. A must have for every snow lover.

other_pictures.title: Heaven on Earth
other_pictures.subject: Switzerland
other_pictures.description: Taken in Wengen while enroute to Jungfraujoch from Interlaken. The halt at Wengen was absolutely worth every penny for the striking views that it offered.

master_picture.title: Dreamy Beauty
master_picture.subject: Bougainvillea
master_picture.description: We have this flower blooming in our apartment balcony. The pink of the flower with the backdrop of the garden greens is one of my favourite macro shot.

other_pictures.title: Dreamy Beauty
other_pictures.subject: Bougainvillea
other_pictures.description: We have this flower blooming in our apartment balcony. The pink of the flower with the backdrop of the garden greens is one of my favourite macro shot.

other_pictures.title: Simplicity
other_pictures.subject: Bougainvillea
other_pictures.description: Another macro shot of the flower blooming my apartment balcony garden. The Bougainvillea individual flowers are so simple and yet together the bloom looks magnificient.

other_pictures.title: Heavenly Beauty
other_pictures.subject: Bougainvillea
other_pictures.description: A high-key shot of the bloom in my apartment balcony garden. Love the glowy dream like backdrop created by the bright sky.

other_pictures.title: Pink Beauty
other_pictures.subject: Pink Hibiscus
other_pictures.description: Hibiscus are perfect flowers because each flower has both male and female reproductive structure. Here a closeup view of the Pistil.

other_pictures.title: Shadows
other_pictures.subject: Pink Hibiscus
other_pictures.description: Another view of the Hibiscus perfect flower. Love the shadow of the Pistil on the texture of the Petals.

other_pictures.title: Extreme Closeup
other_pictures.subject: Pink Hibiscus
other_pictures.description: Closeup view of the Stigma which are the five hairy spots at the top of the Pistil. Stigma is the place where pollen is collected.

other_pictures.title: Garden Pea Flower
other_pictures.subject: Blue Pea Flower
other_pictures.description: Amazing texture in the blue petals of the flower. Love the blue with yellow combination on flower and pink, white and green in backdrop in this macro shot

other_pictures.title: Visitor in My Garden
other_pictures.subject: Butterfly on Flower
other_pictures.description: Guest to my apartment garden without any prior invitation. Fortunate to have such guest visit me and Wish they do so every day multiple times.

other_pictures.title: Gems of Nature
other_pictures.subject: Red Rose
other_pictures.description: Like humans wear ornaments. This is nature's way of providing ornaments. The Red Rose by itself is marvellous. The dew drops on it in early winter morning just take it to another level of beauty.

other_pictures.title: Bleeding Violet
other_pictures.subject: Violet Balloon Flower
other_pictures.description: Love the texture on the petals that is glorified by the high key backdrop. Glad to have them in my apartment balcony garden.

other_pictures.title: Midnight Blue
other_pictures.subject: Morning Glory Flower
other_pictures.description: These small blue-white colored flowers create a star like feel in the garden. This low key image of the bloom from my apartment garden is an attempt to capture it.

master_picture.title: Giving The Stare
master_picture.subject: Wild Cat
master_picture.description: Looking straight at me through my lens. Wonder what it was trying to convey. Probably trying to say, one shot is enough and please move-on.

other_pictures.title: Giving The Stare
other_pictures.subject: Wild Cat
other_pictures.description: Looking straight at me through my lens. Wonder what it was trying to convey. Probably trying to say, one shot is enough and please move-on.

other_pictures.title: The Innocent Look
other_pictures.subject: Monkey
other_pictures.description: Saw him in Mysore near Bangalore (India). Just after having a snack, he gave me this innocent look. Probably asking for something more to eat.

other_pictures.title: The Curious One
other_pictures.subject: Langoor
other_pictures.description: Love its big expressive eyes. Captured this shot at the Bhadra Forest in Karnataka (India) while doing a jungle safari jeep ride. It was sitting high up on a tree and looking around.

other_pictures.title: The Thinker
other_pictures.subject: Monkey
other_pictures.description: Another one captured at the Bhadra Forest in Karnataka (India). Love how it was looking up as if thinking deeply on some new idea. May be.

other_pictures.title: Dance in the Rain
other_pictures.subject: Indian Peacock
other_pictures.description: As it started drizzelling, she started dancing with the beautiful display. Fortunate to see this at the Bhadra Forest in Karnataka (India) while on a safari jeep ride.

master_picture.title: Misty Morning
master_picture.subject: Reflection
master_picture.description: Morning fog in the winter season in Vancouver is very popular. Specially on the bay side, it creates such amazing views with the fog shrouded cityscape and reflections in the bay water.

other_pictures.title: Misty Morning
other_pictures.subject: Reflection
other_pictures.description: Morning fog in the winter season in Vancouver is very popular. Specially on the bay side, it creates such amazing views with the fog shrouded cityscape and reflections in the bay water.

other_pictures.title: Bay Side Reflections
other_pictures.subject: Reflection
other_pictures.description: Another view of the fog shrouded cityscape and its reflections in the bay water. The fog cover has reduced little by now as the morning progresses. But still enough to create an amazing view.

other_pictures.title: Majestic Skyline
other_pictures.subject: Reflection
other_pictures.description: Riding on a boat on the Hudson river in NewYork, could not resist this majestic view of the NewYork skyline. Special interest on the tallest one.
